gobblin.audit.values.policy.column

Class AbstractColumnProjectionPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.audit.values.policy.column.AbstractColumnProjectionPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColumnProjectionPolicy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProjectAllColumnProjectionPolicy

    public abstract class AbstractColumnProjectionPolicy
extends Object
implements ColumnProjectionPolicy
    A base ColumnProjectionPolicy that reads config to initialize the key and delta columns to project for a table.
    • Key and delta fields/column locations to project should be provided by concrete subclasses by implementing ColumnProjectionPolicy.getDeltaColumnsToProject() and ColumnProjectionPolicy.getKeyColumnsToProject()
    • The protected member tableMetadata contains the Schema, tableName and databaseName to derive the projection columns

      List<String> getAllColumnsToProject()
      Combine both key columns and delta columns to project A union of ColumnProjectionPolicy.getKeyColumnsToProject() and ColumnProjectionPolicy.getDeltaColumnsToProject()
